website_summaries.verdict: With interchangeable, convertible jars, this wet grinder gives you options and flexibility.
pros: 1.5 liter jar with detachable multi-purpose blade
converts to 1 liter jar with flexible lid
Half-liter chutney jar with fixed multi purpose blade
Reset switch at the bottom for extra protection
cons: Consider inverting jars after washing to keep washers and screws around blades from rusting

customer_reviews.title: Gave up life after a few days. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it after a friend recommended the brand. After a couple of days, the jar base(black) completely burnt up and melted causing damage to itself and the same friends hand who recommended it. Not sure if this company tests products before it dishes them out but this could be fatal if kids are around. Totally unsafe, I would not recommend this brand to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Akshay Dighe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong, high quality and works great even after 2 years of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and works fantastic on all things that are required for Indian cooking or making masala- paste (spice paste), idly batter, dosa batter and all things that normal off the market shelf blender cannot do. Advice to non-indian folks - Indian cooking by far requires the heaviest amount of grinding, blending and other rough usages which any other cuisine does not require. In other words if this fits me it will fit your use for sure! This is extremely durable and can be used for anything (crush ice, margarita mix, salsa, avocado dips etc). I have been using this for last 2 years without a glitch in the heaviest of manner- highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Subhakam Misra

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and satisfying result
customer_reviews.text: Our family is the biggest fan of preethi after using this mixer. We tease each other that we have almost become brand ambassador of preethi coz with our mouth publicity almost 10-12 people in my circle have bought preethi mixer in USA Canada as well as India. It was a dream come true when we got a smooth ginger garlic paste without adding a drop of water in it. The best product if you make South Indian dishes at home and also for regular cooking. Comes with two pots with two lids each.
customer_reviews.author: Ishan

customer_reviews.title: The power is not as good as many us based blenders
customer_reviews.text: whenever I try to use mixer for hot ingredients, it throws away the lid and the contents are all over my kitchen. i tried to get other mixer in exchange but it had same problem. The power is not as good as many us based blenders. The only good thing is it grinds coarse without water for most indian masalas. I m keeping the product. but its not the safest one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Gouri Tamhankar

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It's been only 6 months that I purchase this mixer and it stopped working. There wasn't heavy usage or mishandling. It worked well as long as it worked, but then again, it's too expensive to buy a product to last only 6 months. If you check the warranty booklet, you would realize that the warranty is just for the name. Because it does not cover jars, lids, domes, mixie body and cap! Really, what does it cover then? Highly recommend to search other brands before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable blender
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I just got this blender recently. Was surprised with its loud noise. My old PremierG was quite soft comparatively. This blender stopped working in the middle when I was using it. I was making a purée so no overload. I tried to reset it and leave it overnight. Then the same thing happened again. It stopped in the middle. Left me in a mess as I couldn’t finish what I had started to blend. The reset didn’t work anymore. Had to finally return it. I would not recommend this blender/grinder to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent mixer
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 4 Sumeet mixies, I wish I got Preethi long long ago. it is easy to use, works wonders for all Indian chutneys, grinds coconut, large pieces of ginger etc like magic. (Sumeet was 180$ each and never worked, always used to trip off, could grind only very small quantity at a time, lid doesnt easily fit, it was a menace.) after wasting 800$ on sumeet, buying Preethi is like winning a jackpot. There is nothing more convenient than a Preethi mixer. Must have for all INdian households esp south indian. have a happy grinding session
customer_reviews.author: Vennela

customer_reviews.title: Designed to Grind finely for Indian cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Design of this mixer is just what INDIAN people needs. Much better than any American blender, which does not Grind as needed for Idl, dosa or chutneys. I bought this after many frustration of grinding idly batter and now, I absolutely love it. Anything made in India knows the process and procedure of cooking needs for Indian people and so it is designed as per requirements. This is the product if you need to make many batters or Chutneys. Cons - the blade of the jar is not easily detachable, so need to clean the jar as soon as you are done grinding to avoid drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - worked for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. It worked fine for 3 years, after that small jar stopped rotating as the blades got stuck, we tried to remove its parts and tried to make it work but it didn't work. During this 3 year span, we also had to change Circuit Breaker Reset Switch once as the Machine stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen-suji

customer_reviews.title: The jars are extremely bad
customer_reviews.text: BUYERS BE AWARE!! I brought this jar 2 months back for over 100$, only to find that after multiple running, one of the jars went bad, and would leak, if you run the mixie. I reached out to the seller only to learn that jars are not under warranty, and that I have to buy separately. If you buy an item for over 100 bucks, and then can't expect a seller to replace a jar, then it is a waste product. Since one month window has passed, you can't return either.
customer_reviews.author: Arindam

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your hard earned $100
customer_reviews.text: This is the single worst purchase I made on Amazon. The mixer stopped working 4 months ago. I have been constantly contacting amazon and the dealer but neither one took responsibility and offered any solution. I'm more disappointed in amazon for this purchase, because they promote the product and did not take any responsibility when it stopped working. Utterly disappointed. I'm never going to buy anything from amazon or this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: babina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, but defective.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a brand new mixer and it arrived on time but defective. It doesn’t work on speed level 1 and 2, as shown in the attached video. The jar handle is not properly set and the screws are such that I cannot fasten those myself. This piece is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: No reliability no trust on this brand
customer_reviews.text: Completely waste of money . How happy I was to bring this mixer home but seems this product betrayed me . It’s chutney jar blades became so stiff and tight that while using it onto the machine smoke comes out. I feel scary to use anymore for the other jar too. That too within just 8 months usage.
customer_reviews.author: Alok kumar Singh

customer_reviews.title: Best product for indian food
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for making dry fruit balls [laddu]. Works great as a dry grinder. I had lot of difficulty finding such a product as many item like the ninja, magic bullet etc. failed miserably, but this product is amazing. Works great for all Indian food preparation like chutneys, dosa batter, puran poli batter. The machine is very loud, manufacturer needs to add some noise dampers.
customer_reviews.author: AMy

customer_reviews.title: A blessing for anyone looking for a quick and mess free grinder
customer_reviews.text: Review after using it for 1.5 months. My search for a sturdy grinder stopped with this one. I make a lot of curries, chutneys and ground my own spices and this Magic machine does it effortlessly. I love the suctions at the bottom that keep the grinder from moving. I just spend extra to clean to keep the pristine white color which is harder when you use turmeric a lot so my only input would be to make the body of the grinder in black but overall very very happy with the product. It delivers on its promise!
customer_reviews.author: Cheefunky

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning will be difficult There are screw heads inside the mixie that makes it difficult to clean. Removing the blade to clean needs unscrewing outside bottom part that sits on motor. Washers need to be removed and liable to be lost and it is The lids are bit flimsy and are of cheap quality. The rubber inside lid is very flimsy and looked like it will come apart soon. Do not expect any thing from customer support (Pretthi), no response ever received Read the return policy before buying, they say returns are free but there is restocking fee and other conditions that is not clear how much refund will be.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Love using it for appam, idli, dosa batters
customer_reviews.text: It’s noisy but performance wise, exactly what you expect from an Indian blender. I was able to blend appam and idli/dosa batters so well. The American kinds leave it so gritty. This is so powerful that it turned out super smooth. I even use for for milkshakes. All in one!
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an Indian mixer with it’s typical sized jars suitable for indian cuisine preparation. I decided on buying from Preethi brand as my experience with the so called good brand Prestige was very bad in India. Its been almost a year now of heavy useage of this mixer at my home and since then i have recommended many friends and people about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit

customer_reviews.title: Most useful kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: I am an Indian and here in US I was looking for an Indian mixer grinder for chutneys and all. I have used couple of grinders of different brands before, all failed in some time. This one is really sturdy. Though it’s bigger jar is of different material (less sturdy) as compared to its smaller jar.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grinder
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying it. But no doubt it is very efficient in dry and wet grinding. Made dosa batter, chutneys, powder spices, nuts powder, pulses powder. Also tried making smoothies and juices too works for everything. Have not tried frozen fruits or ice. But for rest all Preethi Eco Twin Jar Mixer Grinder, 550-Watt is very good. Best was with 2 jars they give 4 lids which help you to make jar small when quantity is less. I use it daily and it's very quick too
customer_reviews.author: Ashish V

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Efficient but noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile mixer and grinder and is very well suited for the daily needs of kitchen. Especially for Indian style cooking to prepare dry masalas. Form factor is a bit odd but not as elegant as Blue Leaf. One thing to note is when it runs the noise levels are really high. No where close to the noise levels of Blue Leaf. Regardless of what the description says this is quite noisy
customer_reviews.author: B. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a motor brush issue
customer_reviews.text: Used rarely. The mixer grinder stops working randomly. Seems like a motor brush issue. Tried to contact Preethi customer service but got no response! Very disappointed with product and service!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks so easily
customer_reviews.text: This mixer breaks so easily. I've been struggling with this for a while now since it would work for sometime and then stop working suddenly. Trip switch doesn't work and after a random set of trials of hitting the start switch and trip switch it would start working again. After using it once or twice after that it breaks again. I've gotten so frustrated with this product that I'm going to throw it away and stay clear of Preethi products.
customer_reviews.author: Victory Fire

customer_reviews.title: Jar is bad.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from Amazon. Worked as desired for about 4-5 occasions. Then for some unknown reason the jar and blades became so tight that they won’t move. Grinder motor overload switch tripped over and over again. Called for service. They said it can’t be fixed. Paid me back the price I paid. (It was over 1 yr, and we had the extended warranty. ) Jar is bad. Warranty is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul A.

customer_reviews.title: Lid problem
customer_reviews.text: The mixer has a huge problems with the lid. You literally have to sit on top of the lid to hold it from flying off while grinding. Almost every time you grind the lid comes off and the liquid inside scatter all over the places. There is no lid latching mechanism to hold tight while grinding. Probably the manufacturer would never figure out how to design
customer_reviews.author: Dhana Ganesan

customer_reviews.title: For all indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: Using it for more than a year. It’s perfect for chutneys, dry powders, idly batter, smoothies, soups etc etc. it’s powerful. Easy to clean. I like to make my own masalas like garam masala, cumin powder, pepper powder etc. This helps with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keeshu

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a month since I bought it. I am using this to make chutney, idly batter and other small dishes. This is definitely better than my Kenstar nixie which I owned previously. Product came on time, and working perfectly . I would definite recommend this to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Used it maybe 5 times so far and the handle is wobbling. Screws for it on the inside of jar. Screw driver can only be used at a 30 degree angle, so can't tighten it a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Twain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bachelors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bachelors and small family. I have been using this product from a month now. So far so good. Easy to use and clean. I used the small jar till now to make puree, ginger garlic paste and it does the job well. I use the big jar mainly for smoothies. However, the only thing that I wasn’t happy about is the blending power especially when I use frozen fruits, I need to blend it for an extra time to get properly blended smoothly. My mainstays personal blender did the same job in lesser time. Yet to try traditional Indian dosa/idly batter. Overall
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Very good grinder 750 Watt good enough for what we do
customer_reviews.text: Finally a grinder from the back east design where you do not have to add water to get any dry grinding started which defeats the purpose. Reason is the gap between the blade and the bottom is just a few mm compared to the majority of the other grinders got in the US
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical buying this after seeing the reviews.. But still i went for it, as my friend has one and he recommended it. But believe me, its such an awesome product. It really grinds everything well. Chutney Dosa Batter Idli Batter Dry grinding Trust me , Go for it. You will be satisfied.. !!
customer_reviews.author: Harishkumar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Works great. Crush materials with fine powder. Just problem is with noise. Another issue-you need to hold tight the cover while grinding otherwise your materials will spill off.
customer_reviews.author: Tareq

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on 2nd use!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working on my second use. Was wet grinding urad dal into batter when the mixie suddenly stopped working. The motor gave off a burnt smell though I made sure to getting using cold water. I have owned the same mixie from the same seller which worked perfectly fine for the same recipe. Must be a defective piece. Returning to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Janani Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: Few things we didn't like about the product although functionally it does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: Few things we didn't like about the product although functionally it does the job well - grinding!! 1) Those projecting screws of the handle inside the jar was a clear turnoff. 2) Washer in the big jar underneath the blade started developing rust after 2-3 use - may be it is not a stainless washer. 3) Removing and inserting jars is a pain. Very tight and not a user friendly design. 4) Vacuum suction is not that good and its quite noisy. Returning the product within 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Madhu

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do !
customer_reviews.text: Do you crave for a Good Dosa, idli, Chutney, Curry or any Paste? Are you fed up using those other blender and Juicers available at local store? Do you always wonder how your Mother could make that smooth paste for any batter? The answer is: Preethi Mixer Grinder. It does what it is supposed to do. I enjoy the delicious Dosa and idli now. Initially i was skeptical to buy this product based on other customer reviews, but since it was was sold by amazon i took a shot at it. It is working absolutely fine for last few months(I have a Square Trade Warranty..Just in case)
customer_reviews.author: Aby

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've EVER made on Amazon. Trust me, I am not overstating it. I had a Cuisinart food-processor and blender for two years. Those were the most frustrating years of my life. It was useful only for rough-chopping onions! And nothing else. Preethi, on the other hand, can grind anything; black pepper, coffee beans, coriander seeds, dry red chillies, roasted dal--all turn into super-fine powder! Also, great for making batter of any kind. It changed my life. I am still getting over the trauma of that terrible Cuisinart. But Preethi makes cooking a joy. Another plus point is that it is not too loud (unlike Cuisinart!).
customer_reviews.author: cheshirecat

customer_reviews.title: ... is needed when are you doing some heavy griding like fresh coconut griding or griding the pulses
customer_reviews.text: I used it only few times in the last few years as this is bulky as compared to US based mixers but it has more power which is needed when are you doing some heavy griding like fresh coconut griding or griding the pulses. I wanted to write this review for so long but wanted to use this mixer multiple times before i wanted to post the review. Even after using it only few times with medium grinding material , the Motor Coupler broke. I really did not have a clue as to why it broke so easily. I spent almost $100 for it and did not use it for more thn 10 times and its useless now.
customer_reviews.author: anurag

customer_reviews.title: Best for Indian recipes like green chutney
customer_reviews.text: We love it.. best for making green chutney and for many more Indian recipes.. we have tried many more mixer grinders, but this one satisfies our blending needs. Highly recommend buying..
customer_reviews.author: Sumit

customer_reviews.title: Lid needs to be tight fitted.
customer_reviews.text: The mixer grinds fine. Sometimes it leaves chunks and is unable to break them down after repeated grinding. The lid needs to be tight fitted for the jar with a licking mechanism. The lid for the jar comes off once you start the mixer. You have to really hold it down tight. If not the food goes flying everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sangram Parelkar

customer_reviews.title: stopped working just after a month.
customer_reviews.text: my wife loved the product and used it couple times a week. the mixer just stopped working while using the small jar today. we tried the overload switch etc. but to no avail. We contacted Amazon and asked to replace the product. i want to believe this was a one-off issue and the next one will be better. will update this review after using the replaced product
customer_reviews.author: highlander_NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great help for Indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: Grinds well, good for making batter. The only problem I had was the handle screws got loose in a couple of days, fixable though
customer_reviews.author: T_Parekh

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic service!
customer_reviews.text: The service is horrible. I bought this mixer in Jan’20. It has been only 6 months and one of the jar is not not working. The product is still in the warranty period. Tried contacting the seller and they said that since it was not bought from their site, they cannot help! Amazon, verify the sellers before listing them. Even the seller number provided by you is out of service I’m clueless.
customer_reviews.author: Shekhar

customer_reviews.title: Indians will love it !
customer_reviews.text: blending power is amazing especially for Indian food . Noisy compared to the ones we get here . The jar which came along was used (had scratches inside) and they din’t replace .
customer_reviews.author: Reshma

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth in deciding whether to buy this mixer/blender and I am happy that I did! Its been more than 10 months and use it every single day. It does a good job grinding coconut, lentils, rice and I powder my spices with the small jar it comes out very fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much noose
customer_reviews.text: I think its not original quality preethi mixer. It is making lots of noise while using. My sister brought the same mixer directly from company which doesn’t make much noose. We are not even using this mixer because of the too much noise and planning to buy one direct from the company
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, but little things broken
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mixer is great no complaints. 3 stars for broken meat mincing blade,. I fixed it and even though won't be using it on regular basis, however it was broken and needed fixing.
customer_reviews.author: laxine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad design. Making very loud noise. The lid open and makes mess
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product never ever again. I used it 3rd time yesterday, it leaked and created a mess in my kitchen. Why can't these people design it better with low noise and something that hold the lid instead of holding the lid down all the time. I really want to return this junk for my money if the particular one is the only defective one. I have no idea why others have gave 4 star. I would give a negative rating.
customer_reviews.author: Raja Loganantharaj

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the product- the coupler quality is too bad. You'll be making repeat purchases on couplers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer some time back. The product has major flaws with the way coupler is designed. I already spent $12 to buy spare couplers twice already, but the product quality is so bad that it keeps breaking. Very recently for the third time (see attached evidence) Very upset with the quality and expensive spare couplers.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Very very noisy motor
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all satisfied with the product. This produces so much of noise as if it will break now. I got really scared just after one use. I am going to return it back definitely. After reading lot of reviews and being its Indian made I decided to purchase it but now I think I made a huge mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Chittaranjan Pradhan

customer_reviews.title: Best for indian dishes
customer_reviews.text: This is such as great grinder... Must have for indian kitchens... Lil noisy and screws are not that tight on the container but those are not big issues. Good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jai

customer_reviews.title: It works but looks like low quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had a Preeti mixie in India and wanted to use the similar in the US and purchased this item. Found that the overall quality is not up to the mark. The jars are built using a very thin sheet and look like low quality. I was expecting a better quality product from Preeti.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Good Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mixer few months ago. So far working well. One issue observed - difficult to unlock the small jar. Have to do it carefully when holding the base with left hand and twisting the jar with right hand anti-clockwise. or else sharp lower edge of the handle will cut your finger on the left hand. Happened a few times. Improve design by rounding off all the sharp edges every where.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money......
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item . Completely waste of money. Bought it after a friend recommendation and the motor burned only after three time use. Luckily I was able to return it. So I ordered again, this time the small jar was licking from 1st day and only after ten times use it stopped working. And the big jar is not good for chutney grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Vikash Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job well
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for years and haven't had a single issue. Does the job well. I now operate a small home food business and it holding up well to that too. I grind spices as well nuts, seeds and liquid salt at the same time. People wouldn't buy those overpriced blenders if they knew about this one.
customer_reviews.author: misha  earle

customer_reviews.title: Returned vitamix and bought this. Happier with this one for Indian cooking  but then it did not last
customer_reviews.text: it worked for one year and today suddenly the base of the jar melted and the machine just stopped working all of a sudden. I remember the mixer grinders in India would last a lifetime. disappointed with poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pramod J.

customer_reviews.title: will not grind properly and cleaning is difficult
customer_reviews.text: grinding makes lot of noise. not grinding properly until cut into small pieces. cleaning is difficult and water leaks out of the lid messing up the surroundings
customer_reviews.author: siva

customer_reviews.title: A no frills good blender
customer_reviews.text: A good blender. Nothing fancy Works well. Good for making dough etc for southern Indian receptors like Dosa and Idli I used it to make smoothies too!
customer_reviews.author: R Warrier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Indian Cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Indian Cooking specially for preparing dosa, idli batters, homemade masala powders.
customer_reviews.author: Rinks

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy with this bad choice
customer_reviews.text: I received it today. I tried to grind. It is giving horrible sound, thank god neighbours did not complain, literally I used ear caps to use it. I am feeling very bad about my choice. Motor tripped very frequently multiple times with 1/4 of the quantity in jar. Definitely this product is completely different from the preeti mixer grinders in India.
customer_reviews.author: Srini

customer_reviews.title: Motor burnt
customer_reviews.text: Motor burnt within a month. Hardly used few times!! Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I had preethi eco plus for 8 years .. it still works , but the knob has broken couldnt find replacement part . Ordered this preethi eco twin, the blades are so powerful...wonderful product...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Handy light weight and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a must buy in every Indian household I would say. Idly/ dosa batter comes out real smooth and fluffy. The small jar is very useful and the blades are real sharp, even few pulse would grind any smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful mixi and easy to clean but handle for the jug for loose after some time ,thus givng 3 ratings .
customer_reviews.author: vivek

customer_reviews.title: Worth , Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect, After a recommendation from one of my friend I got this. It does its job, I mainly use for chutneys and batter or other Indian recipes. Loving it. Nice two pots with extra lids.
customer_reviews.author: S. kale

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for over couple of years now. Great product. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful mixer and grinder
customer_reviews.text: Can grind rice, grain in minute. Both wet and dry. Totally satisfied with performance. Would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Rupak Basak

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected for daily Indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the product since more than six months now, we find it very useful and works as expected. We use it for Indian cooking everyday, and we use to prepare Dosa/Idli dough almost daily (for the family of 3), it has been working without issues. Only thing I felt was it is slightly more noisy, could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ve used it even at ten pm in the night while it is not uber quiet not that noisy so you can close the ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprise it still works after so many years. Never thought an indian item bought on amazon would last this long. Touch wood. What would life be without it?! From chutney to dosa batter. I ve used it even at ten pm in the night while it is not uber quiet not that noisy so you can close the windows and be sure your neighbors are not disturbed
customer_reviews.author: Arthy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and how to get this fixed?
customer_reviews.text: Hi, We have used it couple of times and it stopped working. What we should do to get this fixed? We have taken the warranty. How should i get this fixed?
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money & Worst Quality
customer_reviews.text: They Say Stainless Steel but it is absolute rubbish. Full rust issues within 4 days of purchase and motor is giving loud noise. Please stay away from this and dealer is not even concerned about our issues when called. Never ever go for Gandhi Appliances who are not even worried about consumer issues. PLEASE Stay away..........
customer_reviews.author: Saidu Mastan Shaik

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kitchen appliance! works well for chutneys, smoothies, juices, batter, what not! its a very sturdy one. Best quality steel jars and well balanced body. I have been using it regularly for 2 and half years and no issues. It is definitely noisy and so I do not like to run it during the quiet hours. one tip is that with bigger jar, do not fill heavy substances like grains or pulses all the way till top. leave about 1/3 of the jar empty and do it in batches for efficient blending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, but the top came out flying.
customer_reviews.text: I could be putting on the lid wrong, so if anyone could give me a tip on how to do it, I would highly appreciate it. This machine is soooo powerful there's stuff even on my ceiling. This happened twice, I lost more than half of the contents. I just find it so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Romero Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for more than a year now. Haven't faced any issue. I even used to make Idli/dosa batter with this mixie.
customer_reviews.author: Jegan

customer_reviews.title: Great for grinding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Mixie in addition to my regular blender mostly to make chutneys and grind other indian masalas. My MIL used it for idli and dosa batter and she says it grinds everything smooth. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MNSUBB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mixer
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen time made so simple with this mixer. All breakfast items I do in this. All masala right place to do. Also the restart button at the bottom made this awesome product when something goes Wrong.
customer_reviews.author: PRAVEEN

customer_reviews.title: useful for indian spices
customer_reviews.text: posting a late review as started writing review on amazon, this product is really working fine and serving our purpose to grind spices for Indian food, I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nitesh Patil

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was afraid to buy and later bought for the brand name. Good product and good quality. We mainly use it to make idly/dosa batter and it is very much helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chandramathan

customer_reviews.title: Good for grinding chutneys!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome with Indian food. This is what I wanted for making Indian food. Till now works great. Cleaning is same as every mixer bit tricky. Prices of this product fluctuate so watch out. Still have not used customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Akii

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 jars n 3 blades Cos - did not like the quality of steel I am used to glass ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros - it comes with 2 jars n 3 blades Cos - did not like the quality of the steel I am used to glass jars of Oscar blender that are transparent n I can see while grinding. Does not grind as quickly like my Oscar blender (has 4 teeths). Preethi Blades have only 2 teeths. That could be reason for this. NOT Worth the cost $100 for preethi when compared to $40 Oscar.
customer_reviews.author: Ahalya

customer_reviews.title: Frighteningly loud! Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this to anyone. I have used Preethi mixer grinders for years back in India. But this is just shoddily made. It is so loud, I am always trying to put off grinding so as not to irritate the neighbours. I would recommend going for the more expensive mixer in their line up although I have used it in India so cannot say for sure that won't have the same problem with the US (110V) model.
customer_reviews.author: Saptarshi Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super quality can be used for all house hold grinding and smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Kirthi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good mixer. I use this mixer even for grinding my Idly and dosa batter. Works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: venkat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom first bought a used one and it worked so great. Especially for spices and lentils. That one broke after a few years so I bought this one and she loves it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sunena

customer_reviews.title: Loud but works fine
customer_reviews.text: It is working very well and it is brand new so don’t know how it is going to be but it is super loud for sure.
customer_reviews.author: bhama kooragayala

customer_reviews.title: Smoking mixer
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months our unit is smoking and not working very well. Disappointed. For this price I would expect more use out of a mixer. Our older preeti lasted years. Wish there was some kind of warranty. Definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jerin

customer_reviews.title: Powerful grinder
customer_reviews.text: I love the power of this grinder, it would crush everything quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Puneeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grinder
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect grinder for Indian cooking. Price seems little high. But, overall satisfaction guaranteed. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Was happy to know that high quality India products are available ...
customer_reviews.text: MY MOM PRAISES THIS MACHINE EVERY SINGLE TIME SHE USES IT AND WANTED ME TO MAKE SURE EVERYONE OUT THERE KNOWS THEY ARE PUTTING THEIR MONEY IN THE RIGHT PRODUCT! hands down, a very right product for every Indian kitchen!!! Was happy to know that high quality India products are available in the US as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mixer I bought. Used couple of expensive and elongated and they broke in an year. I am very good at taking care of my stuff but the butterfly dint do justice. This product is very satisfying. It is little noisy but that is ruled out because of its result. I recommend it to everybody who is looking for two jar 👍
customer_reviews.author: Shalu

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: I did read reviews "defective product received", never thought I too would get one. Waited for 4-5 days to receive this product and it was defective. I was so excited but didn't anticipate that I would end up being so disappointed..!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but very useful
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey bit serves purpose I have tried dosa batter and chutneys and it is good for that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mixer ever
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many people complaining regarding this but, this is the best mixer I have used so far. I even use this to make my greens. You won’t Lose any fiber when done in this.
customer_reviews.author: Rukkmini

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even work
customer_reviews.text: The mixie didn't even ON. I did all the possible things to make it work but NO. And also the seller is not at all friendly and says they will deduct the shipping fee for returning it. I have no clue why would I pay for their mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kavya

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product last year around May This mixer grinds pretty good. But I found the following faults 1. The sealing on the jar is not perfect. You need to press the lid while you grid. The first time I tried I had the grinding mixture all over the kitchen 2. The grinding mixture goes in between the washer and the lid. It is very hard to clean After almost a year the mixer simply died. It doesn't work any more.
customer_reviews.author: Tom George

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product.Only problem is it makes a weird sound while using and also it is loud, eventually we will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Raju

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best all purpose grinder for everyday use. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rishika

customer_reviews.title: Saves my time and completely replaced my blender
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for grinding coconut into fine paste for various recipes. Before I used to spend about 7 mins with my blender to yield a consistency nowhere near to what this could give me in less than a minute. I powdered some spices also in a jiffy. Totally recommend this for anything that involves blending and grinding
customer_reviews.author: amazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Jar not working as blade is not moving for just 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Jar not working as blade is not moving for just 4 months of use. Shipping to Illinois for service center is expensive eventhough it has 1 year warranty. Hence no other way except trashing it. Also does not grind properly. Hence waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: delicate and wont last long
customer_reviews.text: Few days ago i would have rated it 4star as it does the indian grinding well. today mine broke. i didnt overload it nor used it roughly, just basic grinding. very delicate machine . if you want to buy then plz get the extra insurance. it wont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what an Indian family needs
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this one. She was not expecting a grinder bought in US would work so well. Exactly what is needed in Indian families for daily grinding needs like spices and pastes needed for cooking unlike the US made juicers which are just not powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dilip Kumar Rath

product_meta.title: Preethi Eco Twin Jar Mixer Grinder, 550-Watt
product_meta.description: Size:Оne РасkThe Preethi 'Eco Twin' has an UL approved Motor. Besides a one year guarantee, is provided for Mixer Grinder purchased in US. Self Support Service Kit and Service Instruction Manual is provided for buyers in India.
feature_bullets: Eco Twin' comes with powerful 550 Watts motor that operates at 110v and makes grinding faster and simpler
The Jars and Blades are made of rust-proof stainless steel material. Product type-Stand mixer
1.50 liter jar with detachable multi-purpose blade, converts to 1.00 liter jar with the flexi lid
0.50 liter chutney jar with a fixed multi-purpose blade, converts to 0.30 liter jar with the flexi lid
UL approved for added safety, when compared to any other Indian brand mixie
Note 1 : The jars and blade might have markings/scratches due to the material it's made from.These are not "defects", it's a natural byproduct of the material being used.
Note 2 : Press the reset button at the bottom of the machine if facing any issue with the item.
